mapper.select:

SELECT oi.*, pcl_name, p.pd_no, pd_name, pct_name FROM orders_ins oi INNER JOIN prod_ins pi ON oi.pi_no = pi.pi_no INNER JOIN prod_color pc ON pi.pcl_no = pc.pcl_no INNER JOIN prod p ON p.pd_no = pi.pd_no INNER JOIN prod_ctg pct ON p.pct_no = pct.pct_no WHERE oi.od_no = #{od_no}
